all.count: SELECT count(`data_artical`.`sid`) as `count` FROM `data_artical` WHERE `data_artical`.`title` LIKE CONCAT('%',:q,'%') GROUP BY `data_artical`.`sid`
all.query: SELECT `data_artical`.`sid`, `data_artical`.`title`, `data_artical`.`date`, COUNT(`data_artical_comment`.`sid`) AS `cnt` FROM `data_artical` LEFT JOIN `data_artical_comment` ON `data_artical_comment`.`aid` = `data_artical`.`sid` WHERE `data_artical`.`title` LIKE CONCAT('%',:q,'%') GROUP BY `data_artical`.`sid` LIMIT :offset,:length

all_aid.query: SELECT `data_artical_comment`.`sid`, `data_user`.`name`, `data_artical_comment`.`comment`, `data_artical_comment`.`datetime`, `data_artical_comment`.`vertify` FROM `data_artical_comment` LEFT JOIN `data_user` ON `data_user`.`sid` = `data_artical_comment`.`uid` WHERE `data_artical_comment`.`aid`=:aid LIMIT :offset,:length
